Posts.Content: Hi Katee They have both grown a little bit but not fast enough for me lol .How are you doing ? x
Posts.Title: Aches and pains with Docetaxel

Posts.Content: Hi .I was prescribed Tramadol .Really helped me + i also had last 2 at a reduced rate as I had some horrible side effects with T......Everyone is different + I seemed to sail through FEC but unfortunately T (the evil one ) as I named it was not very kind to me. On a positive note I am now about 10wks post chemo + all seems like a long time ago now. Remember to write down all your side effects + take them with you for future appointments as they can all be dealt with. Good luck + Take care Shaz x We can beat this critter !!!!
Posts.Title: Aches and pains with Docetaxel

Posts.Content: Love your post ..... Got my 1st chemo on the 27th  +  your post has made me feel less worried already Best of luck on your journey    Lets kick cancers butt !!!!!! take care  x
Posts.Title: Starting chemo in 11 days.....

Posts.Content: Really glad things are starting to look up for you Talk about throwing it all at you at once Best of luck with ct scan All the best x
Posts.Title: AT LAST ! I can't stop crying

Posts.Content: Enjoy your party + cheers + also very well done on your weight loss Best of luck with reconstruction Take care Shaz x
Posts.Title: Raising a glass to everyone going through treatment

Posts.Content: Hi so sorry to hear this. I think some people ignore the topic of  cancer... full stop ! Little do they know how alone you feel on this journey + I feel your pain. Maybe you should talk to them 1st + explain that you need to talk. I have found that certain people just choose to ignore you because of there own fear. Stay strong + know that one day you will be able to put this behind you Take care x
Posts.Title: I am experienceing anger at my family andfeel awful about it

Posts.Content: Hi Avril I am seeing them on 3rd March + then I think its about a 6 wk waiting list. Mine is quite hard + a bit uncomfortable also but it's only 5 wks since surgery(mastectomy + implant on right boob ) + have been told that it is healing well. How long ago did you have your surgery ? Shaz x
Posts.Title: Info please HELP

Posts.Content: Hi Helen   thanx for answering.Am  getting used to the idea now... it  just came as a bit of a shock as thought I was nearly there ! Now I have thought about it more obv its in my best interest to just go with it as I am sure its better to throw everything at it . Shaz x
Posts.Title: Info please HELP

Posts.Content: Hi Rebecca I love the way you have named your boobs ...made me chuckle Also i am glad to still be here + am back to feeling a lot more positive today. Shaz x
Posts.Title: Info please HELP

Posts.Content: Thanx Pat +  also wish you all the best with your treatment + hope its kind to you....Up to now mine has all gone well... so really don't like moaning Shaz x
Posts.Title: Info please HELP

Posts.Content: Hi all Has anyone found out that they are having rads after there reconstruction  please ? Does it always damage implant so that it then needs re-doing ? Thought I only had 3 Herceptin to go + this would be the end of this journey + that I could start getting my life back....but have been told 15 sessions of rads (targeted) are needed ! Really has thrown me into a meltdown  cannot seem to stop crying + worrying Any info please esp if this has happened to you ...sorry for the whinge but highly confused Take Care all Shaz x
Posts.Title: Info please HELP

Posts.Content: Hi Avril We have done things quite different then as I had my chemo 1st + finished that in Dec also on Herceptin trial so only 3 of them left to do.( Had nodes done at the beginning of treatment + am glad to say they were clear ) I am going to try to remember to ask lots of questions at my app + will let u know Take Care Shaz x
Posts.Title: Info please HELP

Posts.Content: Hi Sounds a bit like my day yesterday ! But glad to say  much more relaxed 2day. We all have the odd shite day ...we are allowed Take care shaz x  .
Posts.Title: Feeling Down

Posts.Content: Hi sorry to hear you  feel alone ...but you have come to the right place to ask any questions you have ...so just ask away + I am sure you will get all the info you need to get through this. Have you started any treatment ? All the best Shaz
Posts.Title: does anybody talk here?

Posts.Content: Hi Sammi just to let you know I was the same on my 1st dose + side effects from Herceptin also ...never whinged so much before but I was really lucky with the fec so thought this would be similar ...Had a rough 3 wks = didn't want to do it anymore esp as next one was due + I had a rotten cold to! Just had 2nd lot yest which was a reduced dose = been told this one will be easier (but got everything ready just in case ) We are allowed to whinge + cry ...it sure can get you down Hope you feel better real soon Take Care shaz x
Posts.Title: when does it end?

Posts.Content: Hi I have been told about 5 wks  but I think it all depends on your oncologist team  All the best x
Posts.Title: How long have you waited to have surgery after chemo?

Posts.Content: Thanx  hun x
Posts.Title: Great News

Posts.Content: Am so glad to say that both CT scan + Lymph nodes are clear    YIPPEE Another weight lifted Hugs to all Shaz x
Posts.Title: Great News

Posts.Content: Hey all I so luv this thread .... makes me smile!  One of my team is a hotty too Have only seen him once so far ...hoping to see him again soon Shaz x
Posts.Title: Did anyone else develop a teensy consultant crush during their treatment...

Posts.Content: Thanx for all the lovely responses . Sorry to say didn't have a very good night last night ....atleast I don't have to do the last 2 nivestim Oh well just a blip I HOPE Hugs to all Shaz x
Posts.Title: Great News

Posts.Content: Hi Sorry to hear you are feeling so drained   : ( I find that if I have a busy couple of days   ..... that I really  pay for it  the following day Do you think you might be trying to do too much ? As for the eyelashes ...not at that stage yet (I don't have last fec until 8th) ..soo bit behind you Hope your bloods were ok ? Take care Shaz x
Posts.Title: I'm knackered.......

Posts.Content: Fantastic news Take care x
Posts.Title: lymph node biopsy clear

Posts.Content: Well done you ....cannot wait to get my last 3 outa the way Best of luck with your surgery x
Posts.Title: Last chemo done, 3 x FEC and 3 x Taxatere. Done! finito!!

Posts.Content: Hey all Well did it 2day after a shite 3 wks + nearly giving up Have had T reduced so hope this 1 is gonna be a lot easier also bk 2 feeling positive instead of a grizzling wreck Take Care all  Shaz x
Posts.Title: 5th chemo don ......1 to go..... yay

Posts.Content: I know + gd 2 feel bk on form (even if its the steroids helping ) x
Posts.Title: 5th chemo don ......1 to go..... yay

Posts.Content: Love hearing good news Take care x
Posts.Title: Good news!!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Steff Welcome .....This is a brill site with lots of lovely people. I find that by knowing you are not alone in this journey really helps Anytime you need a chat ,  feel free to message me Take Care shaz x
Posts.Title: 28years old with breast cancer!!!

Posts.Content: Have heard of this before .. .Better to get it done now than have to go through it further down the line Stay strong  Shaz x
Posts.Title: Undergoing chemo twice!

Posts.Content: Hi Elaine, Just to let you know I am waiting for an appointment to have BP moniter fitted as it will moniter it over a 24 hr  period to see if its constantly high ? + if so have to go on tablets until its bk to normal ....As I only have 2 Herceptin to go am  hoping this is soon Shaz x
Posts.Title: headaches, high BP and herceptin

Posts.Content: Hi It is all very scary But believe me its your mind  that can be your worst enemy Cut a long story short its nowhere near as bad as you think.  I was diagnosed in July  .... + glad to say have done chemo + am 8 days post Op + it is all do-able Try  not to worry ....You can do this Take Care Shaz x
Posts.Title: Weird few days

Posts.Content: Hi Elaine I have just had Herceptin no 7 + like you BP is high + getting headaches .Spoke to my Healthcare at home nurse today + she has advised me to make an appointment with my GP ,I have an app for tomorrow so will let you know the outcome Take care  Shaz x
Posts.Title: headaches, high BP and herceptin
